bounty_rune.name: Bounty Rune
bounty_rune.description: Gold spawns for the entire team (0:00, then every 3min)

power_rune.name: Power Rune
power_rune.description: Utility or damage runes in the river (every 2min)

wisdom_rune.name: Wisdom Rune
wisdom_rune.description: Bonus XP for support and offlane (7:00, then every 7min)

stack_timing.name: Stack Timing
stack_timing.description: Alert to stack neutral camps (always at :53)

catapult_timing.name: Catapult
catapult_timing.description: Catapult spawn for lane pressure and push

day_night_cycle.name: Day/Night Cycle
day_night_cycle.description: Day/night transition alerts for strategic timing
